House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07862
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING A MANDATORY POSITION FOR A HUMAN RESOURCES TRAINING AND EMPLOYMENT OFFICER IN EACH MUNICIPALITY, CITY, AND PROVINCE, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTIONS 443, 454, AND 463 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7160, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT CODE OF 1991
ABSTRACT : Enumerates the appointment, qualifications and duties of the Human Resources Training and Employment Officer. Tasks the Department of Interior and Local Government, in consultation with the Technical Education and Skills Development Authority to promulgate the rules and regulations necessary for the effective implementation of the provisions of this Act.
